Right?

‎是时候谈谈所有权的事了

translation.en: This might be the worst day for that.
WMLE just got bought.
Walk with me.
Bought by who, fam?
Slow down, fam. Slow down. Hold up. We were for sale?
translation.zh:
‎噢 慢点说 亲 慢点
‎等等 我们什么时候要卖了？

translation.en: Everything and every thang is for sale, Rush.
translation.zh: ‎这世上一切都是可以被买卖的 拉什

translation.en: You ever hear of Camfort Communications?
translation.zh: ‎你们听说过康姆福特通讯吗？

translation.en: Of course, CamCom.
It's a massive network. Satellite. Broadcast. They're sharks, though.
translation.zh:
‎是一家巨型的通讯公司
‎卫星和广播都有涉猎 ‎不过他们都是狠角色

translation.en: Yeah, they are. Hey, girl. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎没错 跟鲨鱼似的… 嘿 姑娘

translation.en: I heard she wears her clothes with the tags still in 'em. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎我听说她穿衣服标签都不撕的

translation.en: Well, anyway, WMLE just got chomped on.
translation.zh: ‎言归正传 WMLE这回就被鲨鱼吞了

translation.en: Like, chomp-chomped. To the bone.
translation.zh: ‎被生吞活吃了 骨头也没吐

translation.en: And now, we are part of CamCom.
translation.zh: ‎现在 我们是康通的一部分了

translation.en: Wait. Hold on, give me a minute here, Marshall.
translation.zh: ‎等等 等一下 给我一分钟 马歇尔

translation.en: 'Cause being a part of that network,
translation.zh: ‎因为成为这个通讯公司的一部分

translation.en: it's the big time. Slam dunk.
translation.zh: ‎应该是大成功啊 大灌篮

translation.en: -[Marshall] Hmm. -Like, I'm feeling very LeBron right now, am I readin' this right?
translation.zh:
‎我现在觉得像勒布朗一样
‎是这么个情况吗？

translation.en: Well, it is game time, LeBron.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 要上赛场了 勒布朗

translation.en: CamCom suits wanna meet you all. All right?
translation.zh: ‎康通的高层想见见你们俩 知道么？

translation.en: -[Roxy] What? -Yo.
This could be big for us.
Trust me. It's all good.
Oh... Right.
Hey, what up? -[Rush] What up? -[Marshall] All right, don't get up.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 各位好么？好嘞 别站起来

translation.en: Rush Williams,
Roxy Richardson, meet Joss Hawkins,
translation.zh:
‎洛克茜·理查森
‎认识一下乔斯·霍金斯

translation.en: executive vice president, acquisitions and development at CamCom,
translation.zh: ‎康通收购与开发部的执行副总裁

translation.en: or what I like to call her, my spanking new boss.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢管她叫 “要虐待我的女王”

translation.en: Spanky there.
-I could get used to that. -I could get used to it, too.
translation.zh:
‎-我会习惯的
‎-我也很快就会习惯的

translation.en: Very impressive group. Very impressive.
translation.zh: ‎大家非常了不起 非常之厉害

translation.en: Quiet group.
Let's get right to it. I have more people to see.
translation.zh:
‎我们就直奔主题吧
‎我还有好多人要见

translation.en: Our plan is to launch
a new national morning drive-time show in time for Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎赶在圣诞期间
‎开播一个全国性的早间高峰节目

translation.en: [Rush] National? I like that.
You know what? I always thought of myself as national,
translation.zh:
‎你猜怎么着？
‎我一直以来都觉得自己该放眼全国

translation.en: you know, and I knew that you would see it.
translation.zh:
‎你知道么
‎我就知道你看得出我的潜力

translation.en: I knew you would, and you. I never met none of y'all,
translation.zh:
‎我一早就知道 还有你也是
‎虽然你们我一个都没见过

translation.en: but I knew deep down inside, I knew that y'all knew.
translation.zh:
‎但我内心深处一早就知道
‎我就知道你们都懂我

translation.en: Oh. What the-- what the--? DJ Stacy K.
I love her. I like her. She...
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢她 很喜欢 她…

translation.en: [stammering] Why she in my... convertible, though?
translation.zh:
‎可她为什么坐在我的…
‎我的敞篷车里？

translation.en: Wait, we doing a co-host thing, now? -[Roxy scoffs] -Is that... Oh, you gonna add me in later?
translation.zh:
‎等等 我们现在是要搭档主持了？
‎是不是… 哦 你之后要把我加进去？

translation.en: Rush, Roxy.
We appreciate everything you've done here at WMLE,
translation.zh: ‎我们很感激你们为WMLE做的一切

translation.en: but we are heading in a different direction.
translation.zh: ‎但我们打算朝一个不同的方向发展了

translation.en: But we drove you here.
translation.zh: ‎可这一路来都是我们在开车

translation.en: Yes, and now we are taking the wheel.
translation.zh: ‎没错 但现在方向盘要交给我们了

translation.en: [Roxy] Just like that?
After we built up the numbers? After we got the audience reach?
translation.zh:
‎在我们辛苦把数字搞上去之后？
‎在我们建立起观众群之后？

translation.en: -We're done. -[Roxy] Mm--
[stammers] Just so you know, this is not taking the wheel.
translation.zh: ‎跟你说清楚了 这根本不是交方向盘

translation.en: This is called a carjacking. This is called a carjacking.
-[Marshall] Guys. -[Rush] This is...
-Let's talk outside. -[Rush] Yeah.
[stammering] So, what I'm supposed...
-[Roxy sighs] Open the door. -[soft] Let's talk outside.
That was fun, right?
Go get me some water.
I am Rush Williams! You don't do that to Rush Williams!
translation.zh: ‎拉什·威廉姆斯 拉什·威廉姆斯

translation.en: Look at me! Look at me.
Number one! And here, look! What does that say?
translation.zh:
‎第一！还有这里 你看！
‎上面怎么写的？

translation.en: [gasps] Number one! And guess what?
-Highest rated! Fan favorite! -[thudding]
I'm the star man! You don't do this to the star man!
translation.zh:
‎我可是电台之星！
‎你怎么能这么对电台之星？

translation.en: And you are huge! In R&B, though.
Stacy K is number one in Pop.
In New York, and Los Angeles, and soon to be the entire nation!
translation.zh:
‎在纽约和洛杉矶
‎很快就要称霸全国了

translation.en: This is out of nowhere, Marshall. Is that it? We're off the air?
translation.zh:
‎这也太突然了 马歇尔
‎到此为止了？我们就这样停播了？

translation.en: The devil is a lie!
Why would you think that I would possess that kind of energy to do that to you?
translation.zh:
‎你们怎么会觉得
‎我会忍心做这样的事？

translation.en: -Come on! No, you have not. -You know what?
-Oh. Thank God. -I got a little emotional.
You did.
I'm going to give you a grand finale show tomorrow.
translation.zh:
‎我明天会给你们
‎安排一集隆重的大结局的

translation.en: [yelling] Oh, come on, man! I got kids, man.
translation.zh:
‎别这样 大哥！我有孩子的 大哥
‎现在可是圣诞节啊！

translation.en: -It's Christmas! -And I feel you!
translation.zh:
‎别这样 大哥！我有孩子的 大哥
‎现在可是圣诞节啊！ ‎我理解你 黑爷们对黑爷们 听着…

translation.en: Black man on black man. Look... [slaps]
translation.zh: ‎我理解你 黑爷们对黑爷们 听着…

translation.en: The holidays is coming up, I get that, and it's hard on everybody.
translation.zh:
‎马上就是假日了 我明白
‎发生了这件事 大家都不好过

translation.en: I mean, not me. 'Cause I'm cashing in. Big time.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 除了我以外
‎因为我这回是狠狠地赚了一笔

translation.en: You really gonna look us in our eye and say that? You gonna fix your mouth
translation.zh:
‎你还说这样的风凉话？ ‎开完这个会
‎你还张得开嘴说这样的话？

translation.en: to say that after we met today? You know why we met, Marshall!
translation.zh:
‎开完这个会
‎你还张得开嘴说这样的话？ ‎你知道我们今天见面为啥吗
‎马歇尔 你看到这些了吗？

translation.en: You see this right here?
translation.zh:
‎你知道我们今天见面为啥吗
‎马歇尔 你看到这些了吗？

translation.en: This is a plan. Know what's in it?
translation.zh: ‎这个计划 知道里面是啥？

translation.en: -[Marshall] What-- -Graphs! Pie charts!
A proposal to own part of this station, Marshall!
translation.zh: ‎这是成为电台共有人的提案 马歇尔

translation.en: And I understand that, [stammers] but you...
[stammering] This... These... Are these the numbers?
translation.zh: ‎这… 这些… 这是我们台的数据？

translation.en: Oh, my God.
I'm so mad y'all didn't become part owners before the deal went through.
translation.zh:
‎我太生气了 你们没能赶在
‎这次的交易前做成共有人

translation.en: -I mean, look at this. These numbers... -Okay, okay.
translation.zh:
‎-瞧瞧这个 这些数据…
‎-好了

translation.en: At least we got our bonuses to look forward to.
translation.zh: ‎至少我们还有奖金可以期待一下

translation.en: [stammers] Got your what?
[stammers] Our bonuses.
-WMLE does the bonuses. -Oh! Oh, your bonuses. Oh...
translation.zh:
‎-WMLE向来都发奖金的
‎-噢 你们的奖金 噢

translation.en: Yeah... about that...
I don't believe this. How they gon' do this to us?
translation.zh:
‎真不敢相信
‎他们怎么能这么对我们？

translation.en: [Roxy] Exactly.  This is ridiculous.
[Rush] H-how did she even get the position? [Roxy] I should've seen this coming.
translation.zh:
‎-她到底是怎么得到这份工作的？
‎-我应该早点预料到的

translation.en: [Rush] Hey, I guarantee you, they gon' regret it.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我向你保证 他们肯定会后悔的

translation.en: I guarantee you they gon'-- they gon' be callin' me back.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我向你保证 他们肯定会后悔的 ‎他们肯定会求我回来的

translation.en: -Oh, this is painful, Roxy. -I know, but--
translation.zh:
‎-喔 这太痛苦了 洛克茜
‎-我知道 但…

translation.en: No, no, this changes too much.
This changes too much.
When I walk into that booth,
and I settle into my chair, and I lean in...
translation.zh: ‎坐上自己的椅子 向前一靠…

translation.en: I smell the metal of that microphone...
and it gets me going.
The second that mic is hot, we are live, and that is my moment
translation.zh: ‎话筒开启的那一秒 我们开始直播 ‎那就是我与听众交流的瞬间

translation.en: to connect with my people.
translation.zh: ‎那就是我与听众交流的瞬间

translation.en: And you might think that I'm freestyling, but no, my message is clear,
translation.zh:
‎你可能以为我是在自由发挥
‎但并不是 我的信息很明确

translation.en: and it is from my heart.
Every... single show, I try to nail that.
translation.zh: ‎每一…场节目 我都想尽力做到最好

translation.en: Every single day, for all these years and to just...
translation.zh: ‎每一天… 这么多年来 结果却…

translation.en: To just have it yanked away from you like...
It just feels like I'm losing a body part. -[wind, vehicles whirring]
translation.zh: ‎感觉就好像我失去了身体的一部分

translation.en: And I-- I'm not ready to say goodbye. I'm not.
translation.zh:
‎而且我… 我还没做好告别的准备
‎我没准备好

translation.en: Listen...
we've been knocked down before.
We just got to find a way to get off the pavement, that's all.
translation.zh:
‎我们只需要想办法再从地上爬起来
‎就这么简单

translation.en: What am I going to tell the kids, though? Okay, Christmas is around the corner!
translation.zh: ‎可我要怎么跟孩子们说呢？ ‎好吗 圣诞节马上就要到了

translation.en: Man, those little faces. They just want so much.
translation.zh: ‎唉 那一张张小脸 他们想要的这么多

translation.en: I mean expect so much. Not so much expect, as demand.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 应该说有很多期待
‎好吧 不是期待 是要求

translation.en: They threaten me, even. [stammers] I tell you, the twins pulled a knife.
translation.zh:
‎他们还威胁我了 甚至
‎我跟你说 双胞胎刀都掏出来了

translation.en: Hey, this is going to work out.
It is.
'Tis the season, right? Just got to have a little faith.
translation.zh:
‎毕竟是圣诞季节嘛 对吧？
‎只要心中有信念就行

translation.en: Do you really believe that?
Isn't that what people are supposed to say during Christmas?
translation.zh:
‎大家过圣诞节的时候
‎不都是这么说的吗？

translation.en: Come on. I'll drop you home. Come on.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 我送你回家 快来

translation.en: ♪ Oh tidings of comfort and joy ♪
-Okay, girls. -[bags rustling]
Okay.
-Let me help you, Daddy. -Oh, thank you, baby girl. Here you go.
translation.zh:
‎-让我帮你吧 老爸
‎-哦 谢谢了 宝贝女儿 给你

translation.en: That one, there. Don't forget that one.
translation.zh: ‎那一个 那边的 别忘了那一个

translation.en: Good looking out.
[Evie] What kind of snack are you making for us? [Gabby] I want pizza.
translation.zh:
‎-你要给我们做什么点心？
‎-我想吃比萨！

translation.en: [Rush] Thanks for--
Oh, no. What am I going to do about the pool?
translation.zh: ‎糟糕 这泳池我要怎么办？

translation.en: [Gabby] No worries, Mya had a "come-to-Jesus" with Daniels.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 米娅跟丹尼尔好好谈了一回

translation.en: Straight up, she lit a fire under him.
translation.zh: ‎她一说 他立马就干劲十足

translation.en: But there's going to be something called OT.
[Rush] Really? Lacrosse?
-[Evie] Yes, Daddy. -[Gabby] It builds team work.
translation.zh:
‎-没错 老爸
‎-能培养团队默契的

translation.en: Yeah, but these things cost a lot of money.
translation.zh: ‎是 但这些东西要花很多钱的

translation.en: Yeah, we're really bad at it, too.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 而且我们也打得很不好

translation.en: Well, you should give it up! Only rich people play lacrosse.
translation.zh:
‎那你们就不要再打了！
‎只有富人才玩长曲棍球的

translation.en: -I know. -Right?
-[descending footsteps] -[Mya] We're home!
Oh, Pops, you're home. I've been waiting. I got the email.
translation.zh:
‎噢 爸 你回来了
‎我一直在等你呢 我收到电邮了

translation.en: -Oh, you got the email. -[Jamal] Yeah.
-Oh, my God, you got the email. -[Evie] Open it! I want to see it!
translation.zh:
‎-我的天 你收到那封电邮了！
‎-快打开

translation.en: [Gabby, high pitch] Hey. Oh, my goodness!
Gabby, take my phone.
We need to memorialize my triumph. Dad, get behind me for the reaction shot.
translation.zh: ‎我们需要记录下我的胜利时刻 ‎老爸 到我后面来 拍个反应照

translation.en: -[Rush] Huh. -[bags thud]
-[giggling] -Yes.
All right. I waited to open this together.
translation.zh:
‎好嘞 我等了好久
‎就是为了要一起打开

translation.en: One for the Jamal Williams future archives.
translation.zh:
‎这将成为贾马尔·威廉姆斯
‎未来的档案之一

translation.en: Definitely wanna film both our faces when we find out.
translation.zh:
‎一定得把我们俩
‎看到结果时的表情拍下来

translation.en: Son, will you open the email? You're killing me, just open the email.
translation.zh:
‎儿子 你能不能快打开啊？
‎你要急死我啊 快打开这封电邮吧！

translation.en: Okay, I love that you're as excited as I am.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你跟我一样激动 这点我很高兴

translation.en: -[Rush] Hey, Jamal. -Yeah.
It is okay if you don't get in. Okay?
translation.zh: ‎就算你没被录取也没关系的 好吗？

translation.en: I didn't go away to college,
and I don't want you to think of it as a failure.
translation.zh:
‎我不想让你觉得这是一次失败
‎我想让你觉得这是…

translation.en: I want you to think of it as carrying on that family tradition, right?
translation.zh:
‎我不想让你觉得这是一次失败
‎我想让你觉得这是… ‎继承家族传统 好吗？

translation.en: -'Cause that tradition-- -I got in!
-[Mya gasps] -I'm in!
-Who's going to Harvard? Me! That's right. -[Rush] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-谁要去上哈佛呀？没错就是我
‎-对

translation.en: -Man, you must be so pumped for me. -Oh, I am, of course, I mean... [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎-老爸 你肯定很为我激动吧
‎-哦 激动 当然了 那个…

translation.en: It's great if you're into that Ivy League-y sort of vibe, you know?
translation.zh:
‎这很棒呀 如果你…
‎喜欢常春藤联盟的那种氛围

translation.en: -Yay! -[Rush] You know what you should do?
You should check out my Alma Mater. For safety.
translation.zh: ‎你应该去看看我的母校 保险起见

translation.en: The Queensborough Community College? Instead of Harvard?
translation.zh: ‎去皇后区社区大学？不去哈佛？

translation.en: -[Jamal] Oh, you are hilarious. -I got you.
translation.zh:
‎-噢 你… 你真是太搞笑了
‎-老爸很会说笑的

translation.en: Oh, man. And look, no worries. I checked and paying a little extra,
translation.zh:
‎噢 对了 别担心
‎我查过了 如果多付一点钱

translation.en: a freshman can park a car on campus.
translation.zh: ‎新生也可以在校区内停车的

translation.en: -There's no car. There's no car. -Yeah, yeah. It's not December 25th yet.
translation.zh:
‎-哪来的车啊？
‎-我懂我懂 还没到12月25日

translation.en: Blah-blah-blah.
We're taking the Jamal Williams experience to Ivy League!
translation.zh:
‎我们要把贾马尔·威廉姆斯的体验
‎带去常春藤联盟！

translation.en: -[girls, together] Yay! -[laughing]
You're too young to be referring to yourself as a brand.
translation.zh:
‎你年纪轻轻
‎不应该把自己当成品牌来称呼的

translation.en: -You know that? -[Jamal] You do it all the time.
-[Rush] Uh-huh. -So... [exhales]
[kids chanting] Harvard! Harvard! Harvard!
Why did I have to have smart kids? Dumb kids are way cheaper.
translation.zh:
‎我为什么要生这么聪明的孩子？
‎蠢孩子要便宜多了

translation.en: Why aren't you sharing in that child's joy?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么不为那孩子感到开心呢？

translation.en: 'Cause it's over. It's all over. We are ruined. Ruined!
translation.zh:
‎因为结束了 一切都结束了
‎我们完蛋了 完蛋了！

translation.en: It's a dark day, Aunt Jo.
It's dark. It's a dark day. I don't know what happened.
translation.zh:
‎倒霉 今天真太倒霉了
‎我都不知道怎么回事

translation.en: I ain't even see it coming.
Are you done? For whatever that was?
The radio station sold.
Job gone.
No more radio. It's done.
-You've saved. I know you've saved. -How, Aunt Jo?
translation.zh:
‎-你有存钱的对吧 我知道你存了
‎-怎么存啊 乔姑姑？

translation.en: The bills, they get higher every month. We got fresh bills!
translation.zh:
‎开销啊 每个月都越花越多
‎我们刚收到一堆新账单！

translation.en: Jamal had to go to Costa Rica to volunteer to dig wells,
translation.zh: ‎贾马尔要去哥斯达黎加做志愿者挖井

translation.en: so that they could have "clean water."
translation.zh: ‎这样他们才能有“干净的水”喝

translation.en: Mya's platinum status on Saks.com, and the twins, there's two of them!
translation.zh:
‎米娅在萨克斯第五大道有白金会员
‎还有双胞胎 两倍的花销啊！

translation.en: And they all go to private school. Not to mention, it's Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎他们都上私立学校
‎更不用说 现在圣诞节要到了

translation.en: Rashon James Williams!
You spoil those kids.
They snap their fingers, and you open your wallet.
translation.zh: ‎他们打打响指 你就打开钱包

translation.en: I've been trying to be both parents.
Give them everything they wanted because I can't be everything,
translation.zh:
‎尽量满足他们的一切需要
‎因为我也不是万能的啊

translation.en: and yeah, okay, [stammering] maybe I gave a little too much.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 没错 好吧
‎也许我的确是太宠了一点

translation.en: You think?
That life's about to change.
-Straight up. -Oh, yeah.
We're about to make some changes around here.
translation.zh: ‎我们这个家要好好做些改变了

translation.en: -Snap the whip. -[chuckles]
Things about to get tight. They about to get lean.
translation.zh: ‎手头要拮据起来了 要勒紧裤腰带了

translation.en: These kids gonna be giving up a whole lot. How do I tell them that?
translation.zh:
‎这些孩子们要戒掉好多东西了
‎我要怎么跟他们说？

translation.en: I don't wanna tell them that. Aunt Jo, please.
translation.zh: ‎我不想跟他们说 乔姑姑 求你了

translation.en: You tell them and bake 'em a pie, okay? I'mma go lay down.
translation.zh:
‎你去跟他们说 给他们烤个馅饼
‎好吗？我得去躺一下

translation.en: This is not a pie situation, son.
translation.zh: ‎现在不是烤馅饼的时候 孩子

translation.en: Remember what your granddaddy said.
It's not what you got, it's what you got around you.
translation.zh: ‎最重要的是亲情 而不仅仅是财富

translation.en: [whispering] What about Christmas for the kids?
It's going to be all right.
Have a little faith.
Everybody keeps telling me that.
[Rush] That was the Everly Brothers,
"Christmas Eve Can Kill You."
Stay tuned for a word from our sponsors.
translation.zh: ‎接下来请收听我们赞助商要说的话

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
Rush out.
Forever.
-[smooth jazz Christmas music playing] -[Janella] Should I call 911?
Rush's mental state doesn't seem stable.
translation.zh: ‎拉什的精神状态好像不太稳定

translation.en: That's not the note we should have gone out on for your last show.
translation.zh: ‎我们的最后一场节目不应该这样收尾

translation.en: You want fans to follow you wherever you go.
translation.zh:
‎你应该想让听众们跟着你
‎无论你去哪里

translation.en: Not follow you off a cliff.
You got to rise above this nonsense.
Be Rush.
Be my star.
Well, if I'm going down in flames...
I'm glad you're the one burning with me.
-We're poor? -[funky music playing]
-Did I say we were poor? -But you don't have a job.
translation.zh:
‎-我刚才说我们是穷人了吗？
‎-但你现在没工作了

translation.en: And you pretty much broadcasted that to everyone.
translation.zh: ‎而且你基本上是向全世界宣布了

translation.en: Brilliant!
-So, no horse? -It's mini-sized.
translation.zh:
‎-所以没有马了？
‎-是迷你的那种呀

translation.en: None of that is happening, okay?
In fact, there's a whole lot of not happening
translation.zh: ‎实际上 还有好多本来要有的东西

translation.en: -that's about to start happening. -[groans]
translation.zh:
‎-以后都不会有了
‎-等等 哈佛也没有了吗？

translation.en: -Wait, is Harvard not happening? -I want it to.
translation.zh:
‎-以后都不会有了
‎-等等 哈佛也没有了吗？ ‎我让你上啊

translation.en: -So, what's the plan? -I don't know yet, son.
translation.zh:
‎-那我们有什么计划？
‎-我还不知道 儿子

translation.en: -Great. -Great.
Hey, give me some time.
-Unbelievable. -So bad.
-[retreating footsteps] -[Gabby] This is worse than bad!
[Rush] Y'all sitting all off in the bleachers -like y'all can't hear the conversation? -[Roxy sighs]
translation.zh:
‎你们俩刚才坐在那边一声不吭
‎假装不会说话呐？

translation.en: Looks like you have plans for a holly jolly Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎看起来你已经做好准备
‎要过一场温馨快乐的圣诞节

translation.en: [sighs] Rush, we need to talk.
-Did it come through yet? -It's getting close. [exhales]
-[Aunt Jo] Did you tell him yet? -I don't have all the details.
translation.zh:
‎-你还没告诉他吗？
‎-我还没完全了解清楚呢

translation.en: You know, I kinda like and dislike the fact that y'all are so close.
translation.zh:
‎你们俩走得这么近
‎我有点高兴也有点不高兴

translation.en: -Mostly dislike. -[Roxy] Okay.
Rush, what if I told you that Krush BQL is for sale?
translation.zh:
‎拉什 如果我告诉你
‎WBQL要出售了呢？

translation.en: Well, great, more people losing their jobs.
translation.zh: ‎哦 太棒了 更多的人要失业了

translation.en: No, it closed down a couple months ago.
translation.zh: ‎不 它几个月前就关门了

translation.en: The building is for sale. The station is up for grabs.
translation.zh:
‎整栋大楼都在出售
‎电台要被收购了

translation.en: So, WBQL is for sale. What's for dinner?
translation.zh:
‎不就是WBQL要出售了吗
‎晚餐吃什么

translation.en: I figured you'd make it after you finish all your decoration.
translation.zh:
‎我还以为等你把装饰做完之后
‎你会自己做呢

translation.en: Hey! Listen to me. We should buy that station.
translation.zh:
‎喂！听我说
‎我们应该把那个电台买下来

translation.en: With what, Roxy? My megawatt smile?
translation.zh:
‎用什么买啊 洛克茜？
‎用我十万伏特的微笑吗？

translation.en: With money!
I built up a pretty hefty 401k.
translation.zh: ‎我的退休基金里存了不少钱

translation.en: You'd put that up for me?
For us.
I'm touched, Roxy, for real.
translation.zh: ‎我很感动 洛克茜 真的

translation.en: But it'd take a much bigger Christmas miracle than that.
translation.zh:
‎但我们需要一个
‎更大的圣诞奇迹才能买得起

translation.en: [Aunt Jo] Is this big enough?
Aw.
That's sweet, Aunt Jo. But I don't think your little coffee can stash
translation.zh:
‎心意我领了 乔姑姑 ‎但我不觉得
‎这一小咖啡罐的私房钱能帮得上忙

translation.en: is going to help much.
translation.zh:
‎但我不觉得
‎这一小咖啡罐的私房钱能帮得上忙

translation.en: [chuckles] There's $45,000 in there.
You wouldn't happen to have more of these stashed under the house, huh?
translation.zh:
‎你该不会在这家里
‎藏了好几个这样的咖啡罐吧？

translation.en: Oh, no, honey, that's my mad money.
translation.zh:
‎哪里啊 亲爱的
‎这只是我的零花钱而已

translation.en: My investment manager takes care of all the big stuff.
translation.zh: ‎大钱都由我的投资经理管着呢

translation.en: Wait, does everyone else have money stashed away but me?
translation.zh:
‎等等 是不是除了我之外
‎所有人都存着钱啊？

translation.en: 'Cause my money just seems to fly away before I can grab it.
translation.zh:
‎因为我的钱好像长翅膀会飞一样
‎我抓也来不及抓

translation.en: -Rush. -Yes?
You got your first break at that station, right?
translation.zh: ‎你最初就是在那个电台走红的

translation.en: -[sighs] -Let's get back to where we started.
translation.zh: ‎对吧？让我们一起回到最开始的地方

translation.en: Isn't that what we always dreamed of?
translation.zh: ‎这不是我们一直以来的梦想吗?

translation.en: That station is way down the dial, Roxy.
translation.zh: ‎那个电台的波段很难调啊 洛克茜

translation.en: Yeah, but I miss the time when we ruled the airwaves.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 但我很怀念
‎我们以前主宰电波的时候

translation.en: We just got kicked off the airwaves last week.
We could be a part of the community again, right?
translation.zh:
‎这样我们又能
‎成为社区的一部分了 对吧？

translation.en: Remember block parties, and pop-up concerts?
translation.zh: ‎记得那些邻里派对和快闪演唱会吗？

translation.en: Charity drives?
We could sponsor Christmas dinner at First Community Church.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以在第一社区教堂
‎办一场圣诞晚宴

translation.en: -Yeah. -Come on, we used to live for that.
translation.zh:
‎-记得
‎-对吧 我们以前就是指着这个活的

translation.en: And the WMLE suits shut all of that down,
translation.zh: ‎后来WMLE的高层把这些都禁掉了

translation.en: and we can bring it all back.
-[serene instrumentals] -Can't you see it?
We get to play the music we want.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以放我们想放的音乐

translation.en: We get to play the music we want.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以放我们想放的音乐

translation.en: It's like the universe is screaming at us right now.
translation.zh:
‎简直就像是这宇宙
‎在冲着我们喊叫似的

translation.en: Let's build Krush BQL back up.
-We'd be taking a huge risk huge. -Huge, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-我们这样做要冒的风险很大啊
‎-很大是没错 对

translation.en: Risk? Eh... Why don't you let me handle that?
translation.zh: ‎至于风险呢… ‎不如就全交给我吧

translation.en: Yeah? Is that a yes?
Yeah?
-Start counting. -Yes!
Oh, it's about to be real merry up in here.
translation.zh: ‎噢 这里终于要快乐起来了

translation.en: -Wow. Okay. All right. -Whoo!
translation.zh:
‎-哇喔 好吧 好的
‎-唔呼！

translation.en: -[melodic] Rush and Roxy! -[Rush] Hey!
-That's it. -[Rush] Oh!
-[indistinct chatter] -All right. Old school. Never mind.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 太老派了 算了

translation.en: Listen, hey, I'm seeing a bright star on our horizon.
translation.zh:
‎听着 各位 我能看得到眼前
‎有一颗亮闪闪的星星

translation.en: -[playful Christmas instrumentals] -An opportunity for all of us.
My old station,
the one that got the Rush engine on the track to begin with, is for sale.
translation.zh:
‎就是让我拉什这辆火车
‎步上正轨的那个 现在要卖了

translation.en: And Roxy and I are buying it.
translation.zh: ‎洛克茜和我打算把它买下来

translation.en: Sounds like somebody's spending money we don't have.
translation.zh:
‎听起来有人要花一笔
‎我们没有的钱了

translation.en: Will you hear me out?
I'm going to need all of you.
Even Aunt Jo kicked in a little cash.
translation.zh: ‎就算是乔姑姑也贡献了一点钱

translation.en: -And I know that it's Christmas-- -[Mya] Oh.
I figured Christmas was already off the table.
translation.zh: ‎我早就知道圣诞节是没戏了

translation.en: Not necessarily, but there will be some sacrifices.
translation.zh: ‎也不一定 但我们要做出一点牺牲

translation.en: Now, in order for me to come up with my share of the money
translation.zh: ‎好了 为了凑出我的那份钱

translation.en: to buy the station,
-I'm going to need to... [muffled speech] -What?
-[Mya] What was that? -I'm sorry, what?
I said, I'm going to need to put the house... [garbling]
translation.zh: ‎我说 我需要把这栋房子…

translation.en: -[Gabby] Hmm? -You have to speak louder.
I'm going to need to sell our house.
-Wait, our house? -Oh, snap!
translation.zh: ‎等等 我们住的房子？ ‎哎呦喂！

translation.en: I didn't see homeless on the menu.
translation.zh: ‎我没想到晚餐要上无家可归这道菜啊

translation.en: I am always going to provide for you kids, okay? [stammering] But let's face it.
translation.zh:
‎我当然会负责赚钱养你们几个孩子的
‎好吗？但我们得面对现实

translation.en: We've gotten a little... What's the word?
translation.zh: ‎我们过去是有点太… 怎么说来着？

translation.en: Bougie.
Will you finish eating your pizza, please?
translation.zh: ‎你能不能先吃完自己的比萨啊？

translation.en: Now, stay with me.
Just stay with me, here. I want you to think big picture, right?
translation.zh:
‎听我把话说完
‎我要你们把眼光放长远一点 好吗？

translation.en: This is a better future for all of us. This is our way out of this mess.
translation.zh:
‎这能给我们家一个更好的将来
‎这是我们摆脱困境的方法

translation.en: Are you ready?
-We're moving back into our old house. -[record scratch]
-What old house? -The house that you were raised in, son.
translation.zh: ‎什么老房子？ ‎你小时候住的那个房子啊 儿子

translation.en: -What? -But Auntie Jo lives there now.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-可是现在乔姑姑住在那里啊

translation.en: There are five of us.
That is a whole mess of people in that tiny house.
translation.zh: ‎那么小一栋房子 我们这么一大堆人

translation.en: There can't possibly be enough space.
Listen, as long as we're together, we'll figure it out.
translation.zh: ‎听着 只要我们在一起 会有办法的

translation.en: One bathroom, six people. I rest my case.
translation.zh:
‎-一间厕所 六个人 这就够了
‎-你…

translation.en: You... Mya, you should be lucky we have this option.
translation.zh:
‎-一间厕所 六个人 这就够了
‎-你… ‎米娅 有这条退路已经很幸运了

translation.en: I can't believe this. I am not going back there.
translation.zh: ‎真不敢相信 我是不会回去的

translation.en: The decision's already been made.
And I bet your big picture has me waving goodbye to my future.
translation.zh:
‎我打赌你这长远眼光
‎是要看着我跟我的未来挥手道别了

translation.en: You think this is easy?
I remember you painting daisies all over that mailbox.
translation.zh: ‎我记得你在那个信箱上画满了雏菊

translation.en: Trying to make it look all cheery.
Like we were getting something other than bills. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎假装我们收到的东西
‎不只是账单而已

translation.en: I wish bills were my only problem right now.
translation.zh: ‎我好希望账单是我现在唯一的问题

translation.en: Oliver Street.
Still holding it down.
[Rush] Ah, man.
Oh, Paula, we had it all.
translation.zh: ‎宝拉 我们那时什么都不缺

translation.en: This little house. You and me.
translation.zh: ‎有这么栋小房子 你和我

translation.en: One bathroom.
A leaky roof.
-Where we got our start. -[chuckles softly]
Moving the kids back in, that's...
translation.zh: ‎让孩子们搬回这里 肯定…

translation.en: that's going to be tough.
-They'll be okay. -[wind whirring] They just need time to adjust.
translation.zh:
‎他们没问题的
‎只是需要些时间来适应

translation.en: I thought I made it.
Thought I'd built them a life.
translation.zh: ‎以为我已经给他们创造了好生活

translation.en: You did.
And you gotta keep chasing those big dreams of yours.
translation.zh: ‎你必须继续追求你的那些伟大梦想

translation.en: And not just the station.
She's a good woman, Rush.
You're ready.
I don't know what I'm ready for.
translation.zh: ‎我不确定我准备好干什么了

translation.en: Cherish the times that we had, but...
translation.zh: ‎珍惜我们度过的时光 但也…

translation.en: turn the page.
You've still got a lot of life ahead of you.
translation.zh: ‎你的生活还有很长的路要走

translation.en: he opened up all the Christmas presents? [laughing]
translation.zh: ‎他把所有的圣诞礼物都拆开了

translation.en: He would not take off that sapphire necklace I bought you.
translation.zh:
‎他怎么也不肯把
‎我给你买的那串蓝宝石项链摘下来

translation.en: Was it you or me who let him wear it to church?
translation.zh: ‎是你还是我让他戴着去教堂来着？

translation.en: Paula, is that you? Are you giving me a sign?
translation.zh: ‎宝拉 是你吗？你这是在示意我吗？

translation.en: [woman over intercom] You better get off my porch. I got a bat and a bad attitude.
translation.zh:
‎你最好赶快从我的前院滚出去
‎我手上有根棒子 而且我脾气很差

translation.en: Aunt Jo?
-[blip of static] -Oh, baby, it's you! You know, I can see you on my phone.
translation.zh:
‎噢 宝贝 是你啊！
‎我能在手机上看到你

translation.en: The things they come up with!
translation.zh: ‎这些新发明啊 真是太神奇了

translation.en: I'm telling you about this violence.
translation.zh: ‎你这暴力行为 我说过多少次了

translation.en: You gotta stop threatening people, Aunt Jo. Seriously.
translation.zh:
‎你不能再这样威胁别人了
‎乔姑姑 说真的

translation.en: [Rush voice-over] A few weeks before Christmas?
Now we gotta leave this house.
Not a creature was stirring,
not even this angry little mouse.
The stockings never got hung by the chimney with care,
translation.zh: ‎无法将长袜小心地在烟囱上挂好

translation.en: no hopes to St. Nicholas which soon would be coming here.
translation.zh: ‎也不敢奢望圣尼古拉很快就来到

translation.en: [Rush continues] The children were nestled, all snug in their beds,
translation.zh: ‎孩子们都被舒适地安顿在床铺上

translation.en: with visions of losing this sweet life probably dancing in their heads.
translation.zh: ‎将要失去这份美好生活的念想 ‎可能在他们的小脑袋中游荡

translation.en: I'll... take that.
[Rush voice-over] Long day. I'm about to call it a wrap,
and settle my brain for a long winter's nap.
translation.zh: ‎放松我的大脑 趁着冬天睡上一觉

translation.en: [Rush voice-over] When under the covers there arose such a clatter.
translation.zh: ‎在那被单之下 发出了一声嘁喳

translation.en: -[Rush chuckles] Oh, no. -[phone clicks off]
No clatter tonight, baby girl.
translation.zh: ‎今晚不能再聊天了 宝贝女儿

translation.en: You just sleep, okay?
Saint Nick,
you better get our change of address.
translation.zh: ‎你最好收到了我们的地址变更

translation.en: -[birds chirping] -[blues Christmas tune playing]
♪ You know we're broke Again for Christmas ♪
Excuse me. Can I-- Can I see that, please?
translation.zh: ‎打扰一下 可以让我看一下么？

translation.en: -What in the holiday hell is this? -[Gabby squealing]
translation.zh: ‎大过节的这到底是什么玩意啊？

translation.en: -[Gabby] We're crowdfunding. -[Evie] For Christmas presents.
translation.zh:
‎-我们在搞众筹
‎-为了买圣诞礼物

translation.en: -[Rush] Who taught you how to crowdfu--? -[Gabby] See, look.
Turns out, mini horses cost a butt-load of money, see?
No. No, no. Sh-- no.
You have no idea how these faces can sell.
translation.zh:
‎你绝对想不到
‎我们这两张小脸有多会演

translation.en: [Gabby] Those crutches? They're our lacrosse sticks.
translation.zh:
‎这两根拐杖
‎其实是我们打长曲棍球的球棍

translation.en: You're going to shut this down, okay? You going to shut it down right now.
translation.zh:
‎你们给我关掉 知道吗？
‎你们立马给我关掉

translation.en: Where's your brother?
[Evie] Okay, let's do this.
-[Rush] Wow. -[playful organ music playing]
Huh, and I thought this was going to be tough.
translation.zh: ‎噢 我还以为这一切会很艰难呢

translation.en: One won't talk to me,
the other one won't even come inside. I got some fathering to do.
translation.zh: ‎另一个连家门都不愿进 我… ‎我要好好尽一下父亲的责任

translation.en: You go upstairs and I'll go outside.
translation.zh: ‎你上楼去吧 让我去外面

translation.en: Thank you, Aunt Jo.
I'm sorry, what was that? [stammers] What'd you say?
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 什么？你刚才说什么？

translation.en: I didn't say anything.
What's that? Your arm fell asleep?
You got folded bad, and you need to get out.
translation.zh: ‎你被关在里面闷得要死 ‎很想出来透透气？

translation.en: Ha-ha-ha-ha.
I will be living out of that suitcase until you come to your senses.
translation.zh:
‎在你幡然醒悟之前
‎我会一直把东西放在行李箱里

translation.en: You need to unpack.
You need to make this room your own.
translation.zh: ‎你得把这变成你自己的房间

translation.en: It's not my room.
[Aunt Jo] Are you coming inside?
-No. -[Aunt Jo] Okay.
But that's where the food is.
And the warmth.
If you put your little Mya flavor on it, and invited some friends over...
translation.zh:
‎如果你按米娅风格装饰一下
‎再邀请些朋友过来…

translation.en: [laughs] [sarcastically] Yeah. We'll stop on that one.
I'm not bringing anyone... here.
translation.zh: ‎我绝对不会带任何人来… 这种地方

translation.en: Why not?
Jamal, your father is doing
translation.zh:
‎贾马尔  ‎-你爸已经在尽全力…
‎-阻止我达成我的目标

translation.en: -everything he can. -To stop me from getting my goals.
translation.zh:
‎-你爸已经在尽全力…
‎-阻止我达成我的目标

translation.en: I've worked hard to be where I am.
Dedicated every shred of my life to stay on track,
translation.zh: ‎奉献我生命的每分每秒 走在正轨上

translation.en: and now that's trash.
And I hate this house.
No disrespect, Dad.
I don't know about you, but this neighborhood,
translation.zh:
‎我不知道你怎么想的
‎但这块社区…

translation.en: it's not Whitestone.
Little girl, you need to know your history.
translation.zh: ‎小女儿啊 你得学一下自己的历史

translation.en: This community has been part of your family's life for generations.
translation.zh: ‎你家好几代人都曾生活在这个社区里

translation.en: I was raised in this house.
translation.zh: ‎我就是在这栋房子里被养大的

translation.en: You were raised in this house. Your mother got c--
translation.zh:
‎你也是在这栋房子里被养大的
‎你妈妈得癌…

translation.en: I can't with you right now.
Look, you just can't understand.
translation.zh: ‎听着 你根本没办法理解

translation.en: What I understand is that you need to appreciate the life
translation.zh: ‎我理解的是 你需要学会感激

translation.en: that your father has provided you.
But we lost all that!
I'm not talking about things.
I'm talking about family.
Usually the Lord keeps me tuned into a lot,
translation.zh: ‎通常主会让我及时知道很多事

translation.en: but this is the first time I'm hearing about this.
We heard about it this morning.
And if you didn't hear your former DJ bought another radio station, well, then,
translation.zh:
‎如果你连自己的前DJ
‎要买一家广播电台的事都没听说

translation.en: you're a beat behind.
This will not affect our Christmas launch.
translation.zh:
‎绝对不能让这事影响了
‎我们圣诞节开播的节目

translation.en: I mean, all due respect, but I'm not sure if there's anything
translation.zh:
‎恕我直言 但我不觉得
‎我们有什么办法来…

translation.en: -that we really can do-- -Stations need advertising.
translation.zh:
‎恕我直言 但我不觉得
‎我们有什么办法来… ‎电台需要广告才能活

translation.en: I mean, we just can't stop advertisers from--
translation.zh: ‎我们可没办法阻止广告客户投…

translation.en: We can, and you will, Marshall. We hold the cards in this market.
translation.zh:
‎我们有办法
‎而且你一定要做到 马歇尔 ‎我们在这个市场上很有地位

translation.en: You need to flex some money muscle.
Advertisers must not buy any time on that station.
translation.zh: ‎我们的广告客户不能在那家电台投

translation.en: Oh, that's hardcore.
Listen, the only thing I care about is winning the market.
translation.zh:
‎听着 我唯一在乎的事
‎就是赢得这块市场

translation.en: My priority is this station beating any and all competition.
translation.zh:
‎我的头等大事
‎就是要这座电台击败所有的竞争对手

translation.en: Somebody has to win...
-[hand whacks desk] -and that better be me.
-Yeah. -We're done.
Come on, Tinker Bell.
I don't like that dude's suits.
You can't do this.
You heard the lady. I mean, I have no choice!
translation.zh: ‎你也听到了 我也是别无选择啊！

translation.en: It's Rush and Roxy.
-It's just business, that's what-- -You gonna Grinch their Christmas?
translation.zh: ‎生意归生意嘛 这只是… ‎你当真要毁了他们的圣诞节？

translation.en: -Nah, it's just business. -[Janella] Wow.
translation.zh:
‎-哪里 生意归生意嘛
‎-哇喔

translation.en: This is a new low.
[Marshall] But it's business.
Marshall...
[laughs] You don't understand business.
This house ain't so bad. You have food like this on the table.
translation.zh:
‎桌子上能有这样的食物
‎这栋房子也就显得不那么糟糕了

translation.en: Yeah, I guess it beats outside.
Okay, we're done.
Yeah.
Don't take one more step.
Santa's elves are not coming up in here, cleaning up this mess.
translation.zh:
‎圣诞老人的精灵
‎可不会来收拾这一团糟

translation.en: Gabby, Evie, your plates need to find a new home in the kitchen.
translation.zh: ‎加比 埃维 ‎给你们盘子到厨房里去找个新家

translation.en: Jamal, clear off this table.
translation.zh: ‎贾马尔 把桌子清理干净了

translation.en: Mya, you're scrubbing skillets.
translation.zh: ‎米娅 你负责把煎锅刷干净了

translation.en: You're in my house now.
I'm scared of you.
[Aunt Jo] Good!
'Cause I got eyes everywhere, my children.
translation.zh: ‎因为我身上长满了眼睛 我的孩子们

translation.en: Back of my head, one on each elbow. You never know.
translation.zh: ‎脑袋后面 两只手肘上各一只 ‎你们最好小心点

translation.en: [Rush voice-over] Children were nestled, um...
way too snug in their beds,
while visions of sugarplums...
[Rush] Are you...?
[Rush voice-over] ...better keep dancing in their heads.
[Rush] You know what? You get to have that one. I ain't--
translation.zh:
‎你猜怎么着？
‎这次算你赢了 我不拿了…

translation.en: Saint Nick, if you don't show up...
you ain't got to worry about that clatter, 'cause I'm bringing it to you.
translation.zh:
‎你不用担心那声“嘁喳”了
‎因为我要来找你了

translation.en: I'm not the one. I'm really not the one.
translation.zh: ‎我可不好惹 我真的不好惹

translation.en: -You can try me if you want. [chuckles] -[dog continues to bark]
translation.zh: ‎你不信的话 可以试试看啊

translation.en: But I'm not that dude.
[Rush] Rush gon' give it to you.
translation.zh: ‎拉什要让给你点颜色瞧瞧了

translation.en: Hasn't changed one bit.
[lightly chuckles] You say it like it's a good thing.
translation.zh: ‎你说得好像这是件好事似的

translation.en: Okay, okay.
[Roxy] I spoke to Pastor Abernathy at First Community.
translation.zh: ‎我跟第一社区的阿伯内西牧师说过了

translation.en: We are on for sponsoring the Christmas meal.
translation.zh: ‎圣诞大餐的赞助交给我们了

translation.en: That feels good.
Mm-hmm.
-[chair squeaking] -And how does that feel?
-Squeaky. -Listen. That chair, that squeaky chair,
translation.zh:
‎-这感觉又怎么样？
‎-嘎吱作响 ‎听着 这把椅子 这把嘎吱作响的椅子

translation.en: and everything in here,
in this fabulous old dump, is all ours.
translation.zh:
‎还有这里所有的一切 ‎这一大堆棒极了的破旧东西
‎都是我们的了

translation.en: -We're business owners. -Mm-hmm
[Roxy] That's got a nice ring to it.
[yelling] That's my Roxy!
-One, two. [chuckles] -[laughs]
[inhales] Well, staff starts tomorrow, and we got a week to get up and running.
translation.zh:
‎好了 员工明天开始上班
‎我们有一星期时间让电台运作起来

translation.en: It's the Holiday Rush
-with Rush Williams on Krush BQL. -Mm.
translation.zh:
‎-由拉什·威廉姆斯主持 就在WBQL
‎-嗯

translation.en: [Roxy] Roxy Richardson.
Oh, hey, Chuck.
What?
We were counting on you.
Yeah, but how far back do we go?
translation.zh: ‎是的 但我们认识有多久了？

translation.en: Yes, we helped you launch that first donut shop.
translation.zh:
‎没错 就是我们帮你
‎把那第一间甜甜圈店开起来的

translation.en: What?
Huh.
Okay, I understand.
It just got cold outside.
Marshall and CamCom have threatened our advertisers.
translation.zh: ‎马歇尔和康通在威胁我们的广告客户

translation.en: Marshall?
We can't broadcast without advertisers, Rush.
translation.zh: ‎没了广告客户 我们没办法开播 拉什

translation.en: We can't...
We can't?
It's actually kinda dope that they're seeing us as a threat.
translation.zh:
‎这说来其实挺牛逼的
‎他们觉得我们是有威胁的

translation.en: We ain't played one song yet,
and they're already trying to shut us down.
translation.zh: ‎他们就在想办法要让我们关门

translation.en: But it's not going to happen.
Roxy.
[hesitant] Rush?
Do me a favor. Come here.
I just want you to step into my office for a second, please.
translation.zh: ‎我想请你站到我的办公室去一下

translation.en: -[playfully scoffs] -Just have a seat.
translation.zh: ‎这边 坐下来就好 坐舒服了

translation.en: Now, I know I get a little sidetracked, but check this out.
translation.zh:
‎好了 我知道我有时可能会分心
‎但你听我说说看

translation.en: Let's take it one step further.
Commercial-free Christmas.
Can you see it?
You know what? I can see it.
And, I mean, we don't have a choice, [laughs] but we can market it like we do.
translation.zh:
‎那个… 我们虽然是别无选择
‎但我们可以营销成我们是故意的

translation.en: -Fake it till you make it. -Okay?
translation.zh:
‎-如想成功 必先假装成功
‎-好诶

translation.en: -Yes. -WBQL...
Oh. "Nothing but Christmas." [gasps]
It's like a gift to your listeners, billboards with your face.
translation.zh:
‎算是送给听众们的一份大礼
‎再把你的脸放上广告牌

translation.en: That's gonna get their chestnuts roasting, ain't it?
translation.zh:
‎这保证能让他们
‎乐得烤起栗子来 对吧？

translation.en: Okay, let me run these numbers,
but with the money coming in from your house,
we should be able to operate without new revenue for a little while.
translation.zh:
‎我们应该能在
‎没有其他收入的情况下运营一会儿

translation.en: Until the ratings come in, and the listeners come in,
translation.zh: ‎等收听率起来了 听众们过来了

translation.en: and then advertisers will be running to buy airtime.
translation.zh:
‎然后客户肯定会
‎争先恐后地来 买广告位的

translation.en: -Yes. -This is a short-term loss
-for long-term gain. -Yes, it is. Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-换的是长期的盈利
‎-没错 正是好 没错

translation.en: This is... [stammers] You know what I got to do?
translation.zh: ‎这是… 你知道我要干什么？

translation.en: -What you got to do? -I got to go and start getting these kids
translation.zh:
‎-你要干什么？
‎-我要让这些小鬼们

translation.en: into this kinda holiday feeling. I got to...
translation.zh: ‎感受一下这假日的气氛 我要…

translation.en: -Okay. [laughs] -I don't know, man.
I want them to feel that Christmas spirit, you know what I mean? Can you feel it?
translation.zh:
‎我想让他们感受到这圣诞精神
‎你明白吗？你能感受到吗？

translation.en: -I can feel it. -[funky music playing] [playfully drawn out] I'm saying, Roxy, can you really feel it?
translation.zh:
‎-我能感受到
‎-我说 洛克茜 你能感受到吗？

translation.en: -[laughing] -[Rush] Make you want to, uh! [laughs]
Hey, thank you.
[gruff exhale] All right, I'll call you later.
-[laughs] Okay. -[Rush] Trying to shut us down.
And I'ma whoop Marshall's butt when I see him.
translation.zh: ‎下次再让我见到马歇尔 我要揍死他

translation.en: -[funky "O Come O Come Emmanuel" playing] -[Rush] I'm thinking, if it was up to me,
translation.zh:
‎好 我在想啊 如果让我选的话
‎我们应该搞一个

translation.en: we would get a little table top tree -like this. -[Mya] Uh, no! No, I like that one.
translation.zh:
‎-像这样的桌上圣诞树
‎-呃 不行 我喜欢那棵

translation.en: [Rush] No, you got to meet me in the middle somewhere.
translation.zh:
‎-那棵！
‎-不 你得跟我妥协… ‎-我们各让一步
‎-不 别这样

translation.en: -[Mya] come on! -[Gabby] That one.
translation.zh:
‎-我们各让一步
‎-不 别这样  ‎-不行
‎-这是米娅的

translation.en: -[Rush] I... -[man] Really?
-[Rush] Wait-- -[Gabby] Yeah, of course that one!
-[Mya] No. -[Rush] Wait a minute. Hold on.
translation.zh:
‎-我喜欢
‎-等一分钟 等一下

translation.en: -[Evie] Totally that one. -You're in charge.
translation.zh:
‎-不 绝对是那棵
‎-你来负责

translation.en: -Don't let them get in trouble. -[Mya] All right, keep looking.
translation.zh:
‎-别让她们惹麻烦了
‎-好嘞 不行！

translation.en: Principal Peters calls me and tells me that you've been cutting classes.
translation.zh:
‎彼得斯校长打电话给我说
‎你在学校里逃课

translation.en: You know, Harvard doesn't like that.
translation.zh: ‎你知道 哈佛可不喜欢这样的

translation.en: You see, it's funny you think Harvard's still happening.
translation.zh: ‎真搞笑 你认为哈佛还有希望

translation.en: What, you don't?
Yeah, well, I just figured it's one of the big sacrifices.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我想得到 这也是大牺牲之一

translation.en: Jamal, don't give up on yourself, son.
translation.zh: ‎贾马尔 别放弃你自己 儿子

translation.en: Why not? You did.
We are extremely poor. You're looking at disadvantaged youth.
translation.zh:
‎我们穷到响叮当
‎你眼前的可是弱势青年

translation.en: My father has no money, no prospects, none!
translation.zh:
‎我爸爸一分钱也没有
‎前途也没有 什么都没！

translation.en: -Isn't that Rush Williams? -Was.
translation.zh:
‎-那不是拉什·威廉姆斯吗？
‎-曾经是

translation.en: [Mya] Now, about this tree...
See, you have a little wiggle room? Through these scrawny branches.
translation.zh:
‎你有没有商量的空间啊？
‎就像这瘦巴巴的树枝间一样

translation.en: [Rush] Oh, whoa. Hey, now, look, I hate to crisp your Kringle,
translation.zh:
‎喔 喂 嘿 听着
‎我也不想泼你过节的冷水

translation.en: my darling daughter, but we agreed on a smaller tree this year.
translation.zh:
‎我亲爱的女儿
‎但我们说好了今年要买棵小点的树

translation.en: [scoffs] Sorry. Excuse me.
translation.zh: ‎啊 对不起 失陪一下

translation.en: Dad, I got this chump on the hook.
translation.zh: ‎老爸 我差点就把这个笨蛋说服了

translation.en: I am sure you do, Mya....
Listen, buddy,
[stammering] what about that six-footer right over there?
translation.zh: ‎那边那棵一米八高的怎么样 ？

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
-Sure. -Oh, joy!
Yeah. Hey, Jamal.
It's Christmas, man.
This is our thing, it's what we do. We pick out a tree for our house.
translation.zh:
‎这是我们的传统
‎我们要一起选一棵树买回家

translation.en: It's not my house.
Don't be like that, man.
My house is in Whitestone.
With a big tree, and big potential, and a big future.
translation.zh:
‎有一棵大大的树
‎大大的潜力和大大的未来

translation.en: And you made damn sure that's over.
translation.zh: ‎而多亏你 这一切都结束了

translation.en: You go sit your ass in the car, okay?
translation.zh: ‎你给我坐回车里去 知道吗？

translation.en: And I'ma go make some Christmas memories.
translation.zh: ‎我要去制造一些圣诞回忆了

translation.en: [scoffs] Whatever.
It ain't all got to be merry.
-Hey. -Hey.
-Whoo, that girl got to be cold. God... -Come on.
translation.zh:
‎-唔 这女孩肯定冷死了吧
‎-拜托

translation.en: You know it's cute.
Bailey's mom got her this sweet Dolce top for Christmas Mass. Me?
translation.zh:
‎贝利她妈圣诞给她
‎买了这件D&G的上装 我呢？

translation.en: I'll be stuck picking through the bins at Bargain Mart for some holiday sparkler.
translation.zh:
‎我只能在廉价超市
‎东摸西找一些节日烟花棒玩

translation.en: How's that supposed to make me feel?
Like you don't have a stupid parent who wasted all that money
translation.zh: ‎你会想你没有一个乱挥霍的笨家长

translation.en: on a piece of a shirt that makes his preteen daughter look like... [shudders]
translation.zh:
‎花钱买一件
‎让他十岁的女儿看上去像是个…

translation.en: -Dad! -[stammers] What came out of my mouth?
[sighs] You don't want me to be happy.
That's not it at all! I'm just saying, hmm?
translation.zh: ‎怎么可能！我告诉你哦 嗯？

translation.en: Over my dead body.
Dad! This is hard.
On December 25th,
all my friends are going to blow up on Insta
translation.zh: ‎我所有的朋友都会在网上发照片

translation.en: with everybody showing off their swag.
translation.zh: ‎大家都会炫耀自己新买的货

translation.en: Kira is going to Hawaii!
Ugh! I can't with her.
-Can you just be happy for her? -Without being sad for myself.
translation.zh:
‎-你就不能为她高兴高兴吗？
‎-不要自怜自艾？

translation.en: I know, Dad. That's easy for you to say.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 老爸 你说得倒轻松

translation.en: Can you give it some time?
We have got some joy coming our way.
translation.zh: ‎马上就会有很多喜乐要到来的

translation.en: -[inspirational instrumentals] -I just need you to believe that.
I get what you're saying, but...
I'll be honest.
I don't have my heart wrapped around this yet.
Gotta bounce. My bathroom time slot.
translation.zh: ‎要走了 轮到我用厕所了

translation.en: I do have hope, and I know you're trying your best.
translation.zh:
‎但我是抱有希望的
‎而且我知道你已经在尽力了

translation.en: It's gotta be hard.
I mean, we're not exactly low-maintenance. [laughs]
[stammers] I'm sorry, I didn't hear that. Can you say that again, please?
translation.zh:
‎不好意思 我没听清
‎你能不能再重复一遍？

translation.en: We're not low-maintenance.
Oh, my God, my heart can't take how much I love you right now. Come here.
translation.zh:
‎我的天 我的心都要承受不了
‎我对你的爱了  来抱一下

translation.en: -Promise me something. -Mm?
That Santa will bring me at least one Insta-worthy moment.
translation.zh:
‎圣诞老人至少会带给我
‎一个值得发INS的瞬间

translation.en: -Go, before you miss your time slot. -[giggles]
translation.zh: ‎去吧 趁还没错过你用厕所的时间前

translation.en: -[Roxy] Possible hoarder situation here. -[Rush laughs]
This woman needs to purge.
-What is she doing with a Thigh Master? -[laughs] I don't know.
translation.zh: ‎她要这个大腿锻炼器是要干嘛？

translation.en: [Aunt Jo, muffled] Don't you touch my precious things.
[whispering] How can she even hear us?
-You better stop messing with her stuff. -I'm...
translation.zh:
‎-你最好别再乱动她的东西了
‎-我…

translation.en: Paula.
Oh.
-[Roxy chuckles lightly] -[Rush] I forgot about this.
Just left it when we moved away. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎我们搬家的时候落在这里了

translation.en: Well, we gotta take it downstairs. Hang up the ornaments on the tree.
translation.zh:
‎那我们得拿下楼去
‎把装饰品都挂在树上

translation.en: -[Rush] Ha! -[Roxy chuckles]
-[Rush] Look at Aunt Jo. -[Roxy] Mm-hmm.
-[Rush] Who he look like? [laughs] -[Roxy]Oh, right. [laughs]
[Rush] Yo!
She packed these away.
Oh, I wish I had sweet memories like that.
translation.zh:
‎噢 我多希望
‎我也有这样甜蜜的回忆啊

translation.en: [inhales deeply] You know, I remember this one Christmas.
I was seven, and it was the year my folks divorced,
translation.zh: ‎我当时七岁 那年我父母刚离婚

translation.en: [laughs] and they couldn't afford separate houses.
-So they drew a line and split the house. -[playful instrumentals]
translation.zh: ‎于是他们画了条线 把房子一分为二

translation.en: Uh-huh. Yeah. Mom upstairs, Daddy downstairs.
translation.zh: ‎嗯哼 是的 妈妈在楼上 爸爸在楼下

translation.en: -[laughs] -[Roxy] It was like a war zone in there.
And then, on Christmas Eve, um,
Daddy had the house, and we were celebrating,
translation.zh: ‎房子归爸爸 我们正庆祝着呢

translation.en: and he snuck into my mom's room
to get his Santa costume out the back of her closet,
translation.zh: ‎到她的衣柜去拿他的圣诞老人服

translation.en: and my brother got so freaked out that he was trespassing
translation.zh:
‎然后我哥哥都吓坏了
‎他这样非法闯入

translation.en: that he called Mom and she called the cops.
translation.zh:
‎于是他打了电话给妈妈
‎然后妈妈报了警

translation.en: [Roxy] And there was Daddy,
translation.zh:
‎-我都不知道说什么
‎-然后呢 爸爸他就…

translation.en: tiptoeing in in his Santa costume to the front of the house,
translation.zh:
‎穿着圣诞老人服
‎在房子面前鬼鬼祟祟的

translation.en: and the cops tackled him before he got to the front door.
translation.zh:
‎还没来得及进前门
‎警察就把他按倒了

translation.en: [Roxy] Yeah.
-[laughing] Oh, Roxy. -[laughs]
[continued laughing] My sweet, sweet Roxy.
-You know what? You well-adjusted. -[laughing]
You really well-adjusted. [cackles] Considering.
translation.zh: ‎真的很健康 考虑到这样的环境

translation.en: [Rush] Help me take the stuff downstairs.
-[Roxy] Yeah. -I got this box. I got this.
[Roxy] All right.
Well, that's the last box.
You gotta get that Christmas tree leaning up against the garage in here,
translation.zh: ‎你得把那棵靠着车库的圣诞树搬进来

translation.en: and set it up.
Christmas tradition. That thing stays outside for three days.
translation.zh:
‎我们圣诞的传统
‎东西要放在外面三天

translation.en: The only reason that tradition started is because you and your mother
translation.zh:
‎这之所以成为了传统 ‎是因为你和你妈
‎不知道该让谁把树搬进来

translation.en: couldn't figure out who was going to bring the tree in.
translation.zh:
‎是因为你和你妈
‎不知道该让谁把树搬进来

translation.en: Well, thank the Lord you have these ornaments.
translation.zh: ‎感谢主 你们有这些装饰品

translation.en: I-- I expected a little more Christmas going on in here.
translation.zh:
‎我… 那个… 还以为
‎你们会有更多有圣诞氛围的东西

translation.en: I like a simple Christmas.
All I need is my Nativity,
and my lights on the tree,
-my baby Jesus, -[Roxy laughs softly]
and a star to light the way.
translation.zh: ‎还有一颗照亮前路的星星就够了

translation.en: And it's gonna be a little bigger this year, for my babies.

‎-我们明天就重新开播了

‎我不想摆那个造型

if it weren't for...

Dance with me.
[strained] Ain't nobody dancing in here.
Don't worry about these people. Come here.

I never thought I would ever feel it again.
You should have done that a long time ago.

When I walked into that booth...
five years ago...
and Paula had just passed...
and you were a mess.
You needed a producer, but you also needed a friend.

‎你需要一个制作人
‎但你更需要一个朋友

And your kids... [laughs]
Who love you.
I love them.
I really do.
And I never thought I'd be a family person.
'Cause my mother and father,

You?

I have some incredible news.
We're rich again?
Rich in love. Rich in love.
I have invited this beautiful lady right here
to join our family for Christmas Day...
and a whole lot of days after that.

-No way. -Jamal!
She is not part of this family!
Son, I know things are coming at you really fast,

-You're need that. -[glasses tap desk]

-Let me ask you something. -[Joss] Mm.
[stammers] Are you okay?
-Yeah. -Yeah?

I like that business.

-♪ Well the snow is falling ♪ -[Rush] What up? Yo, hey, one, two.

Okay. [laughs]
-Yeah. -Let's go ahead

‎-没错
‎-我们开始过一遍节目吧

‎-没错

‎布鲁克林区 皇后区 长岛
‎无论你想要嘻哈还是流行

translation.en: -Aye! That's my Rush. [laughs] -[Rush] That's what I'm feeling,
translation.zh:
‎-这里都有”
‎-诶 这才是我的拉什嘛！ ‎这才对嘛 然后我就要开始

‎我要放些唐尼·海瑟威

‎我要放些唐尼·海瑟威

translation.en: Luther, J Five, Wu-Tang.

‎路德·范德鲁斯、
‎杰克逊五人组、武当派

translation.en: You can play whatever you want. You want to know why?

‎你想放什么就放什么
‎你知道为什么吗？

‎-我们有什么？
‎-我们有自己的音乐

translation.en: -We got-- -We got a problem!
We can't go on.
Okay. All right. You know what, Janella?

-We're ready to go. -[Janella] It's over!
-[Rush] What? -Okay, you're scaring me.
Over! Over! Over! Merry damn Christmas.

‎结束了！都结束了
‎我这该死的圣诞！

‎银行刚才打来说
‎我们的信用额度被取消了！

The buyers for Rush's house pulled out.
-Are you sure? -[exhales] We can't broadcast.
We can't broadcast. Can't pay anybody.

‎现在我们是在非法闯入！

-I think I hear sirens. -We paid for this building.

‎-我好像听到警笛了
‎-楼的钱我们已经出了

‎信用额度只是拿来暂时撑一下

translation.en: Hey, Aunt Jo,
-now's not a good time, all right, I'm-- -[Aunt Jo] Jamal is gone.

‎-现在不是时候 好吗 我要…
‎-贾马尔走了

translation.en: -Gone where? -[Aunt Jo] Heaven knows.
He left to play soccer.
He never came back.
Oh, Lord.
I will be right there. Yes.
Jamal.
Oh, go. Go.
-I'll call you from the car. -Okay.
I think I'm having heart palpitations.
Yeah, I understand. It's gonna be all right.

translation.en: Jamal, where are you?
I texted all his friends.
translation.zh: ‎我给他所有的朋友都发了信息

translation.en: Even my contacts in his class. No one's seen him.
translation.zh:
‎连我认识的他班上的人也打了
‎没人见过他

translation.en: -[door closes] -[Roxy] Hey, everybody.
-Josephine, we hear anything? -Baby, not a word.
translation.zh:
‎-乔瑟芬 有什么消息吗？
‎-宝贝 什么都没

translation.en: And it's Aunt Jo from now on.
I'm going to pop a 'gram about bedazzling his Jordans.

‎我要发个INS说
‎我要在他的乔丹鞋上涂亮片了

translation.en: That should get Jamal texting me back,
translation.zh: ‎这样贾马尔应该就会回我信息了

translation.en: -or running home to kick my-- -Mya... please!
translation.zh: ‎或者跑回家来揍我… ‎米娅… 拜托！

translation.en: [Rush] I can't think.
I know. Let's go sit down. Come on.
translation.zh: ‎我懂 我们先坐下再说 来吧

translation.en: Listen. We will find him, okay? And you know he loves you.
translation.zh:
‎听着 ‎我们会找到他的 知道吗？
‎你知道他是爱你的

translation.en: -He's just hurting. -No, this is on me.
translation.zh:
‎-他只是有点受伤
‎-不 是我的错

translation.en: I've been way too selfish, going after this dream.
translation.zh:
‎一直以来都是我太自私了
‎追逐这个梦想

translation.en: My one concern, my only concern, should've been what's best for my kids.
translation.zh:
‎我唯一的在乎 我唯一的担心
‎应该是怎么样对我的孩子们最好

translation.en: I gotta find my son.
[Roxy] I'll hit the streets with Mya, text you if we hear anything.
translation.zh:
‎我跟米娅到街上去找
‎一听到什么消息就发信息给你

translation.en: [Reginald] I have to say, I just keep outdoing myself.
translation.zh: ‎我必须得说 我真是越做越棒

translation.en: Year after year.
Wow, it's gorgeous.
Well, aren't you Josephine Robinson's little one?
translation.zh:
‎噢 你不是
‎乔瑟芬·罗宾逊的小宝贝吗？

translation.en: I am. And this is--
-A very fine-looking woman. [laughs] -[Roxy laughs]
Roxy. And thank you.
-Are you my Christmas present? -[laughs]
translation.zh: ‎你就是… 我的圣诞礼物吗？

translation.en: [inhales] Well, I'm never mad at a little old school.
translation.zh: ‎这个嘛 我对老前辈是生不了气的

translation.en: Mister, you need to cool it down. We're looking for my brother, Jamal.
translation.zh:
‎先生 你得消停一点
‎我们这是再找我哥哥 贾马尔

translation.en: I haven't seen him. But, I wouldn't know it if I did.
translation.zh: ‎我没见过他 就算我看见了也不认识

translation.en: But, I'll keep an eye out for him, if you like.
translation.zh: ‎但如果你想的话 我会帮你们留意的

translation.en: He looks like this, except angrier. Think you can look for him better, now?
translation.zh:
‎他长这个样 不过应该气冲冲的
‎现在你认得出他了吗？

translation.en: All right, we want to thank you for your help and we hope you have
translation.zh: ‎好嘞 我们非常感激你的帮助 ‎祝你圣诞快乐

translation.en: -a very merry Christmas. -You be sure to tell Josephine
translation.zh: ‎祝你圣诞快乐 ‎你一定要跟乔瑟芬说

translation.en: that Reginald Miller said "merry Christmas."
translation.zh: ‎雷金纳德·米勒跟她说“圣诞快乐”了

translation.en: And she can always call me if she needs help getting her lights put up.
translation.zh:
‎还有如果她需要人帮忙挂灯的话
‎可以打电话给我哦

translation.en: If you "know her" know her,
translation.zh: ‎如果你真了解她 你就知道

translation.en: all Aunt Jo needs is her star on a tree, and her baby Jesus.

‎乔姑姑只需要树上有颗星
‎还有她的宝贝耶稣

translation.en: [Roxy] All right, let's go.
[Rush] Hey, y'all see Jamal?
[young man] No, we ain't see him. Sorry, Mister Williams.

‎没 我们没见过他
‎抱歉 威廉姆斯先生

translation.en: [yelling] Jamal?
I hate coming here! [strained yelling]
Boy!
-Jamal. -[man, yelling] He moved!
Don't you think I know that, Jimmy?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得我不知道么 吉米？

translation.en: [Jimmy] Hey, you're not on the radio anymore!
Don't you think I know that, Jimmy?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得我不知道么 吉米？

translation.en: Je--
Merry Christmas! Merry...
[Jimmy] Merry Christmas to you too!
-[Roxy] Has he ever done this before? -[Mya] No.
Jamal's never done anything like this.
translation.zh: ‎贾马尔从来没做过这样的事

translation.en: -At the old house, maybe? -Maybe.
translation.zh:
‎-在老家呢 有没有？
‎-可能有吧

translation.en: -Oh, here. Let me help you. I can... -[woman sighs]
translation.zh: ‎噢 你好 我来帮你吧 我可以…

translation.en: Thanks.
I am so late for work.
Okay.
[Mya] Aw.
-Look, how cute. -[baby coos]
You're so good with her. You have a little one?
translation.zh:
‎挺会照顾她的啊
‎你家也有个小宝宝？

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, me? No. No, no.
Oh, I'm sorry. I thought she was one of yours.
translation.zh: ‎噢 抱歉 我还以为她是你女儿呢

translation.en: -Oh, no. I mean, not exactly. -We're pretty tight.
translation.zh:
‎-噢 不是 也不能这么说
‎-我们挺熟的

translation.en: -I'll, uh... -She is beautiful.
Thank you.
Where do the babies go while you work?
translation.zh: ‎你上班的时候 婴儿怎么办？

translation.en: Uh, I take a bus to a friend's,
then after that, a bus to work. After work, do it all in reverse.
translation.zh:
‎然后再坐公车去上班
‎下班后 反过来坐一趟

translation.en: Even on Christmas Eve?
Holiday pay! Double time.
I mean, I wish work was closer, but money and all.
translation.zh:
‎我当然希望上班的地方近点
‎但钱嘛 没办法

translation.en: I take the help where I can.
But look at these little nuggets. Everything I do, totally worth it.
translation.zh:
‎但你瞧瞧这几个小宝贝
‎我做得一切… ‎完全值得

translation.en: -I hear you, sis. Good luck. -[woman] Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-我懂的 姐妹 祝你好运
‎-谢谢你

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
It's just another day for me.
translation.zh: ‎对我来说不过是平常的一天罢了

translation.en: -♪ Silent night ♪ -Actually...
Yes, merry Christmas.
-♪ Holy night ♪ -And thank you, for the reminder to breathe.
translation.zh:
‎还有 谢谢你们
‎提醒我要呼吸下去

translation.en: -I love you, Auntie Jo. -[laughs] I love you, too.
translation.zh:
‎-我爱你 乔姑姑
‎-我也爱你们

translation.en: Now...
it's time...
to hang the star up.
-[girls gasp] -This is Auntie's favorite part.
The star lights the path for anyone...
translation.zh: ‎这颗星星会照亮所有人的前路…

translation.en: who wants to find their way home.
-[Roxy] Hey. Nothing. -[Aunt Jo] I haven't heard a peep.
-Should we call the police? -Not yet.
-[Rush sighs] -It's Christmas Eve.
It's the time for family to be together.
To tell stories, to hang stockings,
to open presents.
This is not how it's supposed to be.
I know where he is.
I'll be right back.
Jamal, you got a lot of people worried.
translation.zh: ‎贾马尔 你让大家都很担心啊

translation.en: -[huffs] -So?
Son, Roxy has always been a very welcome part of our family.
translation.zh:
‎儿子 洛克茜很受我们家欢迎
‎她一直以来都是我们家的一部分啊

translation.en: That's not it.
What, Jamal? What? College?
translation.zh:
‎那怎么了 贾马尔？大学吗？
‎你知道我们会有办法…

translation.en: -You know we're gonna find-- -I lost her, too.
translation.zh:
‎那怎么了 贾马尔？大学吗？
‎你知道我们会有办法… ‎我也会失去她的

translation.en: I remember Mom getting sick in that house.
translation.zh: ‎我记得妈妈在那栋房子里生病的样子

translation.en: It's hard to be there.
It's like, when I'm in that house... [stammers]
translation.zh: ‎就好像 我在那栋房子里时 我…

translation.en: I don't feel her.
I don't hear her voice.
And that's why you're here.
-[sighs] -It's your mom's favorite place,
you know how she loved seeing the city lights at Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎你知道她最爱在圣诞节
‎看着城市的灯光

translation.en: I won't forget her.
Son... no.
Your mom, she's everywhere that we are. She's in everything that we do.
translation.zh:
‎你妈 我们在哪里 她就在哪里
‎无论我们做什么 她都会在

translation.en: Your mother's all around us.
I get all that.
Do you?
After she died,
you took me away from the only home I knew.
translation.zh: ‎你把我从我唯一熟悉的家中带走

translation.en: Put us all in that, that big house,
translation.zh: ‎把我们都丢到… 那间大房子里

translation.en: buying us all those things.
It just seemed like you were trying to shut down the memories.
translation.zh:
‎感觉好像你是想用物质
‎把所有的回忆堵上似的

translation.en: Ah, damn.
Man, [stammering] I thought keeping my grieving to myself was the right move,
translation.zh:
‎唉 我以为把悲伤
‎留给我自己是正确的做法

translation.en: you know? I'm just...
Just trying to be a strong father for my kids, man. I...
translation.zh:
‎我只是想在孩子么面前
‎做个坚强的爸爸 我…

translation.en: I get you.
Look at me, son.
I get you.
She was... always excited on Christmas morning.
translation.zh: ‎唉 她… ‎圣诞节早晨总是那么激动

translation.en: She'd be up super early making all this noise in the kitchen,
translation.zh:
‎她总会起个大早
‎弄得厨房里叮当作响

translation.en: trying to wake me up. [sniffs]
We'd be up in the wee hours of the morning wrapping gifts,
translation.zh: ‎我们早上三点就会起来包礼物

translation.en: -[chuckles] -reading instruction manuals, -and assembling bicycles. -[laughs]
translation.zh: ‎读着说明书 拼装自行车

translation.en: Okay? She could not wait to see the smile on your face
translation.zh: ‎知道吗？她等不及想要见到 ‎你打开礼物时脸上的笑容

translation.en: -when you'd open them up. -[playful chuckle]
What kind of mom bangs pots at 6:00 in the morning,
trying to wake her kid up?
Your mom.
And you just knew I was waiting for that noise to run downstairs.
translation.zh: ‎我一听到那声音就立马跑下楼

translation.en: Man.
We got to keep these stories alive.
translation.zh: ‎我们一定得让这些故事保留下去

translation.en: For Mya. For the twins.
-Yeah. -You think you can help me with that?
translation.zh:
‎-是啊
‎-你觉得你能帮我一起吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I do.
And we all deserve to make new memories, too.
translation.zh: ‎但我们也都值得制造些新回忆

translation.en: You know your mom would've insisted on it.
translation.zh: ‎你心里清楚你妈会坚持要我们这样的

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry about Roxy.
translation.zh: ‎听着 对不起 关于洛克茜的事

translation.en: She's a good woman, son.
And I love her.
You do?
[stammers] I ain't never really said that out loud.
But yes, absolutely.
Dad, you've always been there for me, a hundred and ten percent.
translation.zh: ‎老爸 你一直陪在我身边 ‎百分之一百一

translation.en: Now it's time for you.
translation.zh: ‎也许现在该留些时间给你了

translation.en: Yeah, maybe you're right.
You good?
I'm getting there. [chuckles]
Let's go home.
[slurring] Who you staring at?
It's not my fault that you're not on air.
translation.zh: ‎你不做节目了 又不是我的错

translation.en: Damn.
Maybe it is my fault.
[gasps] Screwing my friends on Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎过圣诞节的时候 陷害自己的朋友

translation.en: Him.
Right there.
Heartless.
Why are you still smiling, though?
Maybe it's not too late.
Maybe it's time for Santa Marshall.
translation.zh: ‎也许圣诞老人马歇尔要登场了

translation.en: Yeah. [laughs]
Yeah, that's it.
-[echoing clap] -Maybe it's time for Santa Marshall, yeah.
translation.zh: ‎也许圣诞老人马歇尔是要登场了

translation.en: Yes!
-["Joy To The World" continuing] -Aye, I feel the joy, there it is!
translation.zh: ‎诶 我感觉到喜乐了 这样就对了嘛！

translation.en: -♪ Joy to the world ♪ -Yes, yes, yes!
[Whitney Houston and Marshall] ♪ And heaven and nature sing! ♪
♪ And heaven and nature sing! ♪
[Marshall only] ♪ And heaven and na-na-na-na ♪
♪ Nature sings! ♪
Yes, I'm leaving. I'mma take care of this.
translation.zh: ‎对了 我要走了 就交给我了

translation.en: It's going to be all right. It's going to be okay.
translation.zh: ‎一切都会好的 一切都会没事的

translation.en: Look who I found.
[Aunt Jo sighs] Praise the Lord. Come here, boy.
translation.zh: ‎赞美主 来抱抱我 孩子

translation.en: I'm squeezing you now, but you and me,
translation.zh:
‎我现在是紧抱着你 ‎但你和我啊
‎我们之后要好好谈谈这件事

translation.en: we're going to have a straight talk after this.
translation.zh:
‎但你和我啊
‎我们之后要好好谈谈这件事

translation.en: Aunt Jo.
So what happened to simple Christmas?
The twins did all of this.
I did not have a hand in it.
-Where's my twofer? -[lights click on]
-[Gabby, Evie] Daddy, the lights! -[Aunt Jo chuckles]
[Mya] Come outside, everyone!
Come on.
And just like that, it's Christmas!
translation.zh: ‎这样一来 圣诞节就到了！

translation.en: -[laughter] -[Aunt Jo] Oh, wow! Yes! [laughs]
Let me get this right. You did this by yourself?
translation.zh:
‎我要问清楚了
‎这都是你自己一个人弄的？

translation.en: Well, I had a little help. [giggles]
translation.zh: ‎这个嘛 有人帮了点小忙

translation.en: -[Rush] Oh! -[Roxy laughs]
-Hey! -[laughter]
It was Miss Mya. She wanted to make the house a little magical.
translation.zh:
‎都是米娅小姐的功劳
‎她想让这栋房子看上去神奇一点

translation.en: -Let me see. -[puckering]
Oh, all right. -Well, maybe we need a little more magic. -[Rush laughs]

translation.en: I think it looks homey. [clicks tongue] That's what I was going for.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得看上去很有家的感觉
‎我就想要这样的效果

translation.en: -[Rush] It's beautiful. -Where did you get all these lights?
translation.zh:
‎-很美丽
‎-你是从那儿弄来的灯？

translation.en: Well, we were looking for Jamal, we met all these neighbors...
translation.zh:
‎这个嘛 刚才找贾马尔的时候
‎我们遇见了好些邻居…

translation.en: Told us stories about you growing up, Dad. And then, there's this man,
translation.zh:
‎跟我们说了很多你小时候的故事
‎老爸 然后 碰上了这么个人

translation.en: Mister Miller.
-Reginald? -[Mya] Yes!
He lent us all these lights.
And, Aunt Jo, I think he's sweet on you.

translation.en: Well, my, my, my.
[Jamal] Look,
-Roxy, I'm sorry about what I said-- -Oh, come in here.
translation.zh:
‎-洛克茜 我对我说的话很抱…
‎-噢 来抱抱吧

translation.en: -Don't even worry about it. -Thank you.
Mm-hmm.
And look, Dad. I don't need to go to Harvard.

translation.en: I'm more than happy to start at community college.

translation.en: -Maybe even transfer-- -Pause. Have you lost your damn mind?
translation.zh:
‎-也许以后可以转学…
‎-暂停 你这是疯了吗？

translation.en: So, a Williams,
my son, gets into Harvard. I'mma do whatever it takes.

‎我儿子 被哈佛录取了
‎我肯定会尽我所能

translation.en: -I will sell whatever it takes -[Jamal chuckles] ...to get you there.

translation.en: -How close are you two to your kidneys? -[girls] No!

‎-你们俩跟自己的两个肾熟么？
‎-不行！

translation.en: -[Rush] I love you, man. -Love you, too.
I'm proud of you. Proud of you, son.

translation.en: ♪ Christmas everywhere ♪
This is flat-out cold.
Making us wait to open our one present.
translation.zh: ‎就一个礼物 还要我们等这么久打开

translation.en: [Mya] At least you got a present.
-I am sorry for the wait. -[Aunt Jo] Hey!
Let's do some Christmas, y'all.
Mini horses!
-That don't poop! -[Aunt Jo laughs]
Harvard happening right here.
-[Rush] Hey! -Manifest your dreams, baby.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿！
‎-去实现你的梦想吧 宝贝

translation.en: -[Mya groans] -[laughs] Mya.
There's something that I want you to have.
Mommy's sapphire necklace. Oh, wow, Daddy.

translation.en: -[sniffles] -[Rush] Yes.
Time for me to let it go.
Here.
Thank you.
I'll never take it off. [sniffles]
Just don't let Jamal see it, okay? You know that's baby boy's favorite.

‎但别让贾马尔看到了 好吗？
‎你知道这是我宝贝儿子的最爱

translation.en: -[Mya giggles] -I'm right here.
-Merry Christmas, everybody! -[laughter]
-What is this? -Oh, you know I had to come bearing gifts, now. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎-这是什么啊？
‎-哦 你知道我得带礼物来的吧

translation.en: Look at all the happy faces! Wow.

translation.en: And it's not a car, or a Prada bag, or live horses.

‎这不是一辆车 也不是一只普拉达包
‎也不是活生生的马

translation.en: This is a beautiful mess, right here.
Not so fast.
[Jamal] All right.
-This is from all of us. -Oh, no, no, no.
translation.zh:
‎-这是我们所有人送的
‎-噢 不是吧

translation.en: Santa already gave me the best Christmas present ever.
translation.zh:
‎圣诞老人已经给了我
‎最好的圣诞礼物了

translation.en: Oh, no, it's not a gift. Before you can join the family,
translation.zh:
‎哦 不是 这不是礼物
‎在你加入我们家庭前

translation.en: you must be straight-up shamed like the rest of us.
translation.zh: ‎你必须先像我们一样被羞辱一遍

translation.en: Oh! Shamed?
Yeah.
-[Roxy] Okay. -[paper tearing]
[Roxy] Let's see what we got here.
[Roxy gasps] Oh!
Oh, wow.
Oh.
"All I want for Christmas is...
-[Roxy, tearfully] Thank you. -[Aunt Jo laughs]
Oh, wait. Let me get in there.
-[all] Hey! -[camera clicks]
-[Gabby] My Insta-worthy moment! -[Roxy laughing]
You really can't put a bow on a Christmas like this.
translation.zh: ‎这样的圣诞节简直是不能再好了

translation.en: -But I did, 'cause I'm on the other level. -[laughter]
translation.zh: ‎但我做到了 因为我就是这么厉害

translation.en: Yeah, we got this really big gift coming our way that I forgot to mention.
translation.zh:
‎没错 我们还有一个大礼物要来
‎我忘了跟你们说了

translation.en: See, I got a hold of the buyers of the old house.
translation.zh: ‎我找到了我们老房子的买家

translation.en: Well, actually, I went pounding on their door this morning.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 其实是我跑去他们家敲了门

translation.en: Merry Christmas! Aye, ho.
[Rush] Lowered the price, got the house sold.
translation.zh: ‎我降了价… 把房子成功地卖出去了

translation.en: [Aunt Jo] Oh, yeah!
So we can broadcast now?
Oh, the light just turned green, baby.
translation.zh: ‎噢 绿灯刚亮起来 宝贝

translation.en: -Yeah. -A little faith investment paid off.
translation.zh:
‎-太好了
‎-这点信念终于有回报了

translation.en: -[man] Jamal! Hey, what's going on? -I know that ain't... Is that...?
translation.zh:
‎贾马尔！嘿 你好吗？ ‎我知道这是谁… 这该不会是…？
‎他这是要挨揍了

translation.en: -Oh, he about to get these hands. -Oh. Rush. Oh, oh.
translation.zh:
‎我知道这是谁… 这该不会是…？
‎他这是要挨揍了 ‎拉什！喔 糟糕了！

translation.en: -Is your pops here? -[Jamal] Yeah, he's right here.
translation.zh:
‎-你爸爸在吗？
‎-嗯 他在家呢

translation.en: All right. Hey!
Janella told me that you couldn't broadcast, right?
translation.zh: ‎加内拉跟我说你不能开播 对吧？

translation.en: -So I am here to be your-- -[Rush screaming]
-[thud] -Why, you no good, double dealing, rotten, backstabbing, Christmas stealing...
translation.zh:
‎你这个坏蛋、两面三刀的、腐烂的、
‎背后捅刀的、偷圣诞节的…

translation.en: Yeah! [grumbling]
-You trying to ruin a brother's Christmas? -I quit, Rush. I quit.
translation.zh:
‎-你还想毁了我的圣诞节？
‎-我辞职了 拉什 我辞职了

translation.en: -Not yet! You gonna pay! -Ow! I got money to front the station!
translation.zh:
‎-还没完！你要付出代价！
‎-哎呦！我有运营电台的钱了！

translation.en: -To keep WQBL on air! [struggling] -[Aunt Jo] Rush! Rush!
Stop! You're killing this man!
-Ah... -It's Christmas!
Ah!
Are you serious about the station?
I brought a check. I want in.
translation.zh: ‎我支票都带来了 我也想加入

translation.en: Well, more cash won't hurt.
[Marshall] Partners?
-Partners? -Maybe.
-We'll see. -Okay.
-Silent partner. -[strained] Yeah, that's good.
Daddy, look!
Did Santa do all this?
-[Rush] Oh, babies! -[sleigh bells jingle]
[Rush] Yeah, you know, he probably did.
Probably had a little help from a few extra elves.
translation.zh: ‎也许还有其他几个的精灵也帮了些忙

translation.en: -Worked late last night. -[giggling] [Rush] I heard some tinkering.
translation.zh: ‎工作到昨晚深夜 我听到有敲打声的

translation.en: Why you smiling? You ain't part of this family.
translation.zh:
‎你微笑个什么劲儿？
‎你又不是我们家的人

translation.en: M-my teeth was hot. Just letting 'em get a little-- little bit of air.
translation.zh: ‎我牙齿有点热辣辣的 只是想透透风

translation.en: -Wow, St. Nick, you really came through. -[sleigh bells continue]
translation.zh: ‎哇喔 圣尼克 你这回真做到了

translation.en: -Dad, what are you still doing here? -[girls] Go!
translation.zh:
‎-老爸 你还在这里干什么？
‎-快去！

translation.en: You gotta go spread some Christmas cheer to New York.
translation.zh: ‎你得去把圣诞的欢乐传遍全纽约

translation.en: 'Cause they've been dashin' and blitzin' for Rush!
translation.zh:
‎因为他们都在翘首期待着
‎拉什的回归呢！

translation.en: I'm back! I'm actually back!
Merry Christmas, my beautiful family. I love you so much.
translation.zh:
‎圣诞快乐 我美丽的一家人
‎我太爱你们了

translation.en: Merry Christmas to you, you bundle of love. [puckers]
translation.zh: ‎祝你圣诞快乐 充满爱的姑姑

translation.en: [Rush] And merry Christmas to you, -you awful, awful human being. -[Marshall laughing]
translation.zh: ‎也祝你圣诞快乐 你这个糟糕的人

translation.en: Like, we just can't get rid of you.
translation.zh: ‎真是的 我们怎么也甩不掉你

translation.en: I'm like fruitcake. [laughs]
Not like my mama's, though. Everybody eat hers.
translation.zh:
‎不过不是我妈妈的
‎大家都喜欢吃她做的

translation.en: [shouts] Merry Christmas to everybody!
-Merry Christmas. Yeah! All right. -[Roxy] Yeah.
[Aunt Jo] Where you goin'?
Rush Williams, your Holiday Rush on the new WBQL.
translation.zh:
‎拉什·威廉姆斯 ‎你们的拉什欢乐假期
‎在WBQL新电台开播

translation.en: Strong Island's number one boombox.
I am one blessed man.
I got a lot of holiday love this Christmas season,
translation.zh:
‎这个圣诞期间
‎我收到了很多假日之爱

translation.en: and my wish is to share it with all of you.
translation.zh:
‎而我的愿望
‎是把这份爱分享给你们所有人

translation.en: So sit back, let me take the reigns,
translation.zh: ‎请大家放松坐好 让我来做主

translation.en: 'cause golly it's about to get jolly up in here.
translation.zh: ‎因为这里的气氛马上就要欢快起来了

translation.en: Your presents are all opened, your trees all aglow.
translation.zh: ‎礼物都已被打开 树都已被点亮

translation.en: It's your Holiday Rush, with that Christmas flow.
translation.zh:
‎这里是你们的拉什欢乐假期
‎带着圣诞节的Flow

translation.en: And nothing jingles them bells like this jam right here.
translation.zh:
‎没有一首歌 能比接下来的这首
‎更能“铃儿响叮当”的了

translation.en: You need another hand, Josephine?
There's always a need for more hands helping others.
translation.zh: ‎互相帮助嘛 任何时候总是需要的

translation.en: -Praise the Lord. [chuckles] -[Aunt Jo laughs]
Now, Aunt Jo. You know you need to be on that stage singing.
translation.zh:
‎好了 乔姑姑
‎你知道你得上台去唱一首的吧

translation.en: Oh, I couldn't.
-Come on, Auntie Jo. -You know you want to.
translation.zh:
‎-唱吧 乔姑姑
‎-你知道你想唱的

translation.en: -Yeah, come on. -This day is not about me.
translation.zh:
‎-是啊 唱吧
‎-今天我可不是主角

translation.en: I almost believed that.
-[gasping, oohing] -[Mya] Wow!
One must always be prepared.
[Rush] What? I can't believe what I'm seeing.
translation.zh: ‎什么 ？我都不敢相信自己的眼睛

translation.en: ♪ They're singing deck the halls ♪
♪ But it's not like Christmas at all ♪
translation.zh: ‎但这却一点也不像圣诞的模样

translation.en: -♪ 'Cause I remember when you were here ♪ -[audience clapping along]
♪ And all the fun we had last year ♪
♪ If there was a way ♪
♪ I'd hold back this tear ♪
translation.zh: ‎我会忍住不让眼泪留到脸上

translation.en: ♪ But it's Christmas day... ♪
-[all] ♪ Please! ♪ -♪ Please! ♪
-[all] ♪ Please! ♪ -♪ Please! ♪
-[all, repeating] ♪ Please! ♪ -[Aunt Jo, repeating] ♪ Please! ♪
♪ Baby, please come home! ♪
-♪ Baby, please come home! ♪ -[continued clapping]
♪ Baby, please come home! ♪
♪ Baby, please come home! ♪
♪ Yeah! ♪
♪ Yeah, yeah, yeah! ♪
♪ Yeah, yeah! ♪
[Rush voice-over] It's not what you got, it's what you got around you.
translation.zh: ‎最重要的是亲情 而不仅仅是财富
